alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 9:56PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST BATON ROUGE, SOUTH CENTRAL POINTE COUPEE, WESTERN IBERVILLE AND SOUTHWESTERN EAST BATON ROUGE PARISHES THROUGH 1030 PM CST... At 956 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Catahoula, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Port Allen, Addis, Brusly, Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Ramah, Erwinville, and Lottie. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 158. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
